reviews.snippet: Friendly staff, freshly made sushi

extracted_snippet.original: Friendly staff, freshly made sushi

response.snippet:
Dear Han Van Parijs,
Thank you very much for visiting Tokyo Omakase Sushi & Wagyu (Halal) Asakusa Kimono Experience Restaurant. It was truly wonderful to see your smile!
In addition to Edomae sushi, a style that has been passed down since the Edo period, we also offer sushi made with Wagyu beef, which is a must-try when visiting Japan. Since our restaurant originally served omakase course meals, we also offer a wider variety of sushi, Japan's famous tofu, and traditional desserts. We also offer Wagyu burgers and ramen, so there is something for everyone. We hope you have a wonderful stay in Japan.

reviews.snippet:
Ce restaurant est une pépite !

Premièrement l’ambiance du lieu est très reposante et met à l’aise tout de suite, si vous le voulez vous pouvez même porter des kimono.

Maintenant parlons de nourriture, les suchi sont délicieux ! Ils sont très bien équilibré, le riz est réussi et le poisson est goûtu.
Dans ce lieux pouvez même manger des burger et comme vous l’avez vu sur les photos, ils sont délicieux…

En tout cas ce restaurant est immanquable si vous voulez vous écartez de la foule.

extracted_snippet.original:
Ce restaurant est une pépite !

Premièrement l’ambiance du lieu est très reposante et met à l’aise tout de suite, si vous le voulez vous pouvez même porter des kimono.

Maintenant parlons de nourriture, les suchi sont délicieux ! Ils sont très bien équilibré, le riz est réussi et le poisson est goûtu.
Dans ce lieux pouvez même manger des burger et comme vous l’avez vu sur les photos, ils sont délicieux…

En tout cas ce restaurant est immanquable si vous voulez vous écartez de la foule.
extracted_snippet.translated:
This restaurant is a gem!

First of all, the atmosphere is very relaxing and immediately puts you at ease. If you want, you can even wear kimono.

Now let's talk about the food: the suchi are delicious! They're very well balanced, the rice is delicious, and the fish is tasty.
You can even eat burgers here, and as you can see from the photos, they're delicious...

In any case, this restaurant is a must-visit if you want to get away from the crowds.

reviews.snippet:
Un restaurant charmant avec un service au top elles sont au petit soin et la nourriture est excellente surtout si vous êtes en découvert de la nourriture local et traditionnel les sushis sont raffinés et leurs burgers au wagyu est juste fondant en bouche.
Je reviendrai avec plaisir :)

extracted_snippet.original:

Je reviendrai avec plaisir :)
extracted_snippet.translated:
A charming restaurant with top-notch service. They take great care of you, and the food is excellent, especially if you're new to local and traditional cuisine. The sushi is exquisite, and their Wagyu burgers are simply melt-in-the-mouth delicious.
I'll be back with pleasure :)

reviews.snippet: This is the first time i went to this hidden gem in Asakusa. Not so far from Asakusa Ginza Line Station. The sushi i had is a salmon sushi and maguro (tuna) sushi, they use akai-su (red vinegar) for the rice and it added the richness of the flavour. The restaurant is also has HALAL certification so as a Muslim I don’t feel worry to eat sushi here! The staff is also nice, friendly, and they can speak English.

The restaurant is also has HALAL certification so as a Muslim I don’t feel worry to eat sushi here! The staff is also nice, friendly, and they can speak English.

reviews.snippet: Amazing tiny restaurant hidden in Asakusa, off the beaten path, hidden gem, because of the absolutely stunning wagyu steak and steak burger. reviews.snippet: An incredible experience! Chef Rina’s omakase was flawless from start to finish. Every dish surprised me with its delicacy, freshness of ingredients, and creativity in presentation. The chef conveys passion and care in every detail, explaining the origin and inspiration behind each course, which makes the dinner even more special. The atmosphere is intimate and welcoming, perfect for enjoying the full experience!

extracted_snippet.original: An incredible experience! Chef Rina’s omakase was flawless from start to finish. Every dish surprised me with its delicacy, freshness of ingredients, and creativity in presentation. The chef conveys passion and care in every detail, explaining the origin and inspiration behind each course, which makes the dinner even more special. The atmosphere is intimate and welcoming, perfect for enjoying the full experience!

response.snippet:
Dear Theófilo Bom Conselho,
Thank you very much for visiting Tokyo Omakase Sushi & Wagyu (Halal) Asakusa Kimono Experience Restaurant. It was truly wonderful to see your smile!
In addition to Edomae sushi, a style that has been passed down since the Edo period, we also offer sushi made with Wagyu beef, which is a must-try when visiting Japan. Since our restaurant originally served omakase course meals, we also offer a wider variety of sushi, Japan's famous tofu, and traditional desserts. We also offer Wagyu burgers and ramen, so there is something for everyone. We hope you have a wonderful stay in Japan.

reviews.snippet: A very nice and cozy place. The waitress, Rina, was very kind and helpful. Sushi was fresh and delicious.

extracted_snippet.original: A very nice and cozy place. The waitress, Rina, was very kind and helpful. Sushi was fresh and delicious.
